Jazzy 2.0 RC

data.author: Chris Iverach-Brereton
data.message: Minor cleanup to remove unnecessary/relocated variables

data.author: Chris Iverach-Brereton
data.message: Use `jazzy` branches for CI

data.author: Chris Iverach-Brereton
data.message: Merge branch 'jazzy' into jazzy-2.0RC

data.author: Chris Iverach-Brereton
data.message: Fix typo in IMU bridge node

data.author: Chris Iverach-Brereton
data.message: Non-functional linting issues resulting in CI failures (#67)

data.author: Chris Iverach-Brereton
data.message:
Add A300 to supported platforms (#63)

* Add A300 to the supported platforms
* Move the cmd_vel and odom bridges to a common components array

data.author: Chris Iverach-Brereton
data.message:
Implement PTZ action server interface (#65)

* Add remappings & bridge configuration for the PTZ joint states

* Remap the raw velocity topics from Gazebo, implement the PTZ action server interface. Add a 5x digital zoom to simulate real-world zoom control

data.author: Chris Iverach-Brereton
data.message: Add pan & tilt velocity commands (#64)

data.author: Chris Iverach-Brereton
data.message:
Add GeoTif files, instructions for generating map tiles (#60)

* Add the geotif files & instructions for generating map tiles of the outdoor worlds. Add a column to the worlds table indicating the rough geographic region the world is tagged with
* Add the .gitignore file

data.author: Chris Iverach-Brereton
data.message: Rotate the pipeline world so the solar panels face south. Adjust the pose of the ground so the robot's default spawn position is on flatter ground

data.author: Chris Iverach-Brereton
data.message: Rotate the solar_farm world so the solar panels are correctly facing south

data.author: Chris Iverach-Brereton
data.message:
Add launch instructions, screenshots for new worlds (#59)

* Add screenshots for each of the worlds, add a table with the available worlds

* Move the screenshots into separate files to improve loading speed. Add links to the new files in the table

data.author: Chris Iverach-Brereton
data.message: Increase the XY scaling of the pipeline world (#58)

data.author: Chris Iverach-Brereton
data.message:
Add more simulation environments (#57)

* Add the old cpr_inspection -> pipeline, cpr_agriculture -> solar_farm worlds

* Add the office & office_construction -> construction worlds

* Fix the path to the solar_farm models

* Add the orchard world

* Fix the world names for the office & construction worlds

* Add Dave N as an author, since he created the meshes used in the new worlds

data.author: Chris Iverach-Brereton
data.message:
Rename Gazbo libraries (#55)

* IGN_GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH -> GZ_SIM_RESOURCE_PATH

* More ignition -> gz fixes. Use stamped messages for cmd_vel

* Change the clock bridge to unidirectional instead of bidirectional
